task.title: Display Capture
task.shortdesc: Display Capture is used to capture entire monitor.

taskbody.context:
This section covers steps to capture the display on Windows.
There can be only one Display Capture source per display. If display is needed in multiple scenes, add references to the existing Display Capture Source rather than created a new source. Refer to the link for some more settings related to display capture sources for Windows and macOS: https://obsproject.com/kb/display-capture-sources

step.cmd: Click the ‘+’ icon in the Sources tab.
Select Display Capture from the drop-down menu.

step.stepresult: The settings for a monitor display area to be captured are configured.
